title: Air on the G String | Love never fails (tekst)
description: This instrumental piece is a movement from Bach's Orchestral Suite No. 3. It is characterized by its flowing melody played primarily on the violin and supported by a gentle accompaniment.
The composition exudes a serene and delicate atmosphere, showcasing Bach's masterful craftsmanship.

title: Ave Maria
description: This piece is a setting of the Latin prayer ‘Ave Maria’ to music. It is originally composed as part of Schubert's work titled ‘Ellens dritter Gesang’ (Ellen’s Third Song).
The composition is sung in Latin and features Schubert’s distinctive classical style.

title: Ave Maria
composer: Charles Gounod (arrangement) and Johann Sebastian Bach
description: This piece is a setting of the Latin prayer ‘Ave Maria’ to music. This composition combines the melody of Bach's Prelude in C major with an added vocal line and lyrics for the ‘Ave Maria’ prayer.
It is a popular and well-known adaptation that beautifully blends Bach’s instrumental piece with Gounod’s vocal arrangement.

title: Ave Maria
description: Mascagni’s Ave Maria is a separate composition with its own musical style and arrangement.
While it shares the same title as the other Ave Marias, it is a distinct piece created by Mascagni.

title: Ave Maria
composer: Jónas Árnason, also known as Jón Ásgeirsson or Jón Leifs
description: This composition, Ave Maria (Kaldalóns), is by an Icelandic composer.
It is a unique interpretation of the Ave Maria prayer, reflecting the composer’s individual style and musical influences.
